rows: The goal of the activity, for example, "Prepare documents" or "Present an offer."
The date and time when the activity must be started and finished. By default, both values are set to the current time.
Activity status. For example, "In progress" or "Completed."
The user who is responsible for completing the activity.
html:
Field

Field value

Subject

The goal of the activity, for example, "Prepare documents" or "Present an offer."

Start

The date and time when the activity must be started and finished. By default, both values are set to the current time.

End

Category

Activity category. For example, "Meeting" or "Paperwork."

Status

Activity status. For example, "In progress" or "Completed."

Owner

The user who is responsible for completing the activity.
